mdRecord.dcterms:title: West Virginia ; North Carolina
North Carolina
Rand, McNally & Co.'s New 11 x 14 map of North Carolina
Rand, McNally & Co.'s New 11 x 14 map of West Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rand McNally and Company. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 2 maps on 1 sheet : back to back, col. ; 21 x 32 cm. and 24 x 32 cm. on sheet 29 x 36 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: West Virginia (Inset: Northern portion of West Virginia), p. 27 -- North Carolina (Inset: Western portion of North Carolina), p. 28. [original]
Each map contains an index to counties and cities, figures on the extent of land and water areas, and population statistics. [original]

Removed from a Rand McNally Atlas of the world., p. 27-28. Each map has "Atlas of the world" at top of sheet and "Rand, McNally & Co.'s New 11 x 14 Map of ... Copyright 1895, by Rand, McNally & Co." printed below the bar scale. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: North Carolina--Maps
West Virginia--Maps
